scripts.parser: pegjs src/parser/pmlang.pegjs dist/pm-parse.js && pegjs --trace src/parser/pmlang.pegjs dist/pm-parse-trace.js
scripts.concat: cp -r es5/* dist/ && echo 'Remember to add browserify here or something'
scripts.build: npm run parser && npm run babel && npm run concat
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run cleanbuild && npm run justtest
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dummy: # just chillin', savin' yer comma stress
